cards.name: Axis Bank Atlas Credit Card
cards.summary: Premium EDGE Miles card with tiered rewards, lounge visits, and milestone bonuses tailored for frequent travellers.
cards.seoDescription: Explore the Axis Bank Atlas Credit Card welcome benefits, EDGE Miles earning structure, lounge access, and tier upgrades to plan your travel strategy.

details.condition: Complete 1 transaction within 37 days of card issuance
Complete 1 transaction within 30 days of card issuance
Complete 3 transactions within 60 days of card issuance

travelSpends.eligible: Axis Travel EDGE Portal, direct airline & hotel

tiers.downgradeRule: If spend threshold not met in next anniversary cycle

milesRedemption.transferPartnersValue: 1 EDGE Mile = 2 Partner Points (2:1 for Marriott Bonvoy)

keyHighlights: Earn EDGE Miles faster on travel with built-in tier upgrades
Share generous lounge visits with accompanying guests
Transfer EDGE Miles to airlines and hotels for outsized value

cardStrategies.title: Center your wallet on transferable currencies
cardStrategies.description: EDGE Miles combine fixed-value redemptions with the option to move into partner programs when sweet spots appear.

cardStrategies.title: Track tier milestones across the card anniversary
cardStrategies.description: Atlas tiers reset each anniversary year, so line up big travel or business expenses early to unlock upgrades.

cardStrategies.title: Mix in low-fee backups for exclusions
cardStrategies.description: Pair Atlas with a no-fee rewards or cashback card for categories like utilities or rent that do not earn EDGE Miles.

favoriteCombos.name: Travel EDGE Accelerator
favoriteCombos.note: Use Atlas for travel and lounge access while Magnus handles luxury lifestyle credits and dining offers.

favoriteCombos.name: Miles + Cashback Safety Net
favoriteCombos.note: Retain EDGE Mile flexibility yet cover non-bonus categories with a flat-rate cashback companion.

favoriteCombos.name: Global Traveller Starter
favoriteCombos.note: Combine Atlas lounge visits and partner transfers with a no-forex-fee backup for spends outside the EDGE ecosystem.
